desallsites.message: Show the bar on all websites

desbackgroundimage.message: 选择你喜欢的背景图片：

descountry.message: 输入你的国家域名(或国际化的'com')

description.message: Add the best menu bar to get easy and fast access to all your useful browser options and internet products!

desgooglesites.message: Show the bar only on Google websites

desmenubar.message: 勾选以下你想在菜单栏中看到的元素：

dessearch.message: Keep your current search words when switching between Google products

donatepromotext.message: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!

googletrademark.message: 注意： 谷歌是谷歌公司的商标。使用该商标需要谷歌授权。

textfoot.message: 本软件的授权遵守CC - GNU通用公共许可协议。要查看本许可协议，请访问

desexistingtab.message: 如果您勾选此选项，它将在您现有的标签页中打开链接

upgradecontextitemmb.message: 现在你可以在已有的标签页中打开链接

ratedes.message: 以及让更多的人知道我们和这个优秀的扩展

resetbrowserextension.message: 重置 Proper Menubar 的设置

desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser.

titeldownloadupgrade.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.

showremember.message: 打开选项页面时不再显示此提醒页

skipremember.message: 跳过这项，立即打开选项页面

welcomebasictext.message: Welcome on the Proper Menubar browser extension. Here a brief video about how to use the Proper Menubar extension in your web browser.

promotext.message: Want to use something new and amazing for your web browser? Try the $product$ Browser extension.

donatetext.message: Due to the very small number of donations the project may be closed. Please support further development with a Donation.

descolor.message: Change the background color of the toolbar

desdropshadow.message: 获得工具栏下的阴影效果

desdisplay.message: 在工具栏中显示的谷歌产品项的数量

deshovertextcolor.message: Change the font color when you mouse is over a link

deshoverbackground.message: Change the background color when you mouse is over a link

desremrate.message: If you like Proper Menubar™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

titelchooseproduct.message: Choose the products you want in your menu bar

permissionoption.message: Permission must be enabled to use this feature.

despermissioncopy.message: Remove the cut and copy permission

wpermissionnotremoved.message: The permissions have not been removed

sharetexta.message: Get this Cool Proper Menubar browser extension

sharetextb.message: Hey, this is amazing! I tried the Proper Menubar browser extension just today.

sharetextc.message: The Best and Amazing Proper Menubar browser extension

sharetextd.message: Proper Menubar' browser extension is the Best Useful Tool. Download it and try it yourself!

permissionactivetab.message: This will only manage the Proper Menubar of the web page on the currently open tab page.

permissiontabs.message: This is needed for the following features: to show you the welcome and guide page, manage the Proper Menubar on all the open tabs, and to open the Options page.

permissioncontextmenu.message: This to add all the Proper Menubar item in the web browser context menu.

permissionstorage.message: This to save the settings on your local computer, and to sync it to your web browser account.

permissionpagecapture.message: This to save the currently open web page as an MHTML file type.

permissionclipwrite.message: This to write the selected text with 'copy' or 'cut' function in your clipboard.

permissionclipread.message: This to read the saved text in your clipboard.

permissionbookmarks.message: This to create a custom bookmark in your bookmark manager page.

permissionscripting.message: This is to inject JavaScript and CSS code into websites.

desyoutube.message: Discover and learn more about Stefan's browser extension. Watch it now on YouTube.

desratebad.message: Sorry you have had this bad experience. Please let us know on how we can improve our extension for you.

desrategood.message: Happy to hear that you love Proper Menubar! Will you take a moment to rate us in the browser extension store? Your browser extension store reviews make a difference!

desratetitle.message: Do you love this browser extension?

desratebadtitle.message: How can we make it better?

destapstar.message: Tap a star to rate it on the browser extension store.

deshovermenu.message: Show the menu when you move your cursor on top of the first menu item

descontextmenu.message: Enable the right click menu to show or hide bar

head2.message: Choose your favorite Proper Menubar icon:

barnotvisible.message: Proper Menubar cannot be displayed on this page.

permissionwebnavigation.message: This is needed to instantly make the bar visible on the current web page before the web page is loaded.
